attributes.action: BETTER THE BENEFITS FOR WAR VETERANS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I CONSTANTLY HEAR ABOUT VETERANS UNABLE TO AFFORD COUNCIL TAX,RENT OR OTHER BILLS BECAUSE OF THE SMALL AMOUNT OF PENSION/MONEY THEY RECIEVE PER WEEK- SURELY THE PEOPLE WE HAVE TO THANK FOR FIGHTING BRAVELY FOR THIS`BRILLIANT COUNTRY` SHOULD RECIEVE MUCH MORE THAN WHAT THEY DO.THEY HAVE BEEN PUSHED ASIDE AND FORGOT ABOUT.I FOR ONE,HAVE NOT FORGOTTEN ABOUT THEM.WE OWE THEM,REALLY, OUR LIVES.THE GOVERNMENT SHOULD HELP WITH THIS,AFTER ALL,THERE WOULDN`T BE A GOVERNMENT.

rejection.details: Please resubmit withouth BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
